rooms.name: Entrance Lobby

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A luxuriously designed master bedroom with Vastu-oriented alignment for calm and relaxation. Incorporates natural ventilation through windows.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A guest bedroom designed with adequate ventilation and light following Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A modern bathroom with natural light and ventilation, designed for privacy and comfort.

rooms.name: Servant Quarters
rooms.description: Dedicated servant quarters ensuring comfort and efficiency, located in a discrete but accessible location.

courtyard.name: Central Courtyard
courtyard.description: A beautifully landscaped courtyard acting as the heart of the apartment. It provides natural light, ventilation and serves as an outdoor relaxation area.
